categories: Category:Battles of the First Great Schism

nodes.text: The Battle of Chandrila was a conflict during the First Great Schism fought between the Jedi, and thus, the Republic, and the Legions of Lettow, under General Xendor. Most historians assumed the Jedi were the victors.
Little is known about the battle, though it seems to have take place after the Battle of Brentaal IV and before the Battle of Metellos.
